full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE GDONG CAN GI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA 'BYUNG NGAM @007A *, ,SNYAM PA'I BSAM PAS BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS ^BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PA 'DI LA, NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS PA THAMS CAD BLA MA MKHA' 'GRO'I TSOGS LA CHAGS SO, ,BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,CUNG ZAD DGE BAS BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , , ,)
